info.author: Climatic Ai
info.description: [![GitHub Actions](https://github.com/alteryx/climaticai/actions/workflows/linux_unit_tests.yml/badge.svg?branch=main)](https://github.com/alteryx/climaticai/actions/workflows/linux_unit_tests.yml?query=branch%3Amain) [![Codecov.io](https://codecov.io/gh/alteryx/climaticai/branch/main/graph/badge.svg?token=JDc0Ib7kYL)](https://codecov.io/gh/alteryx/climaticai) [![PyPI](https://badge.fury.io/py/climaticai.svg?maxAge=2592000)](https://badge.fury.io/py/climaticai) [![PyPI Stats](https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/climaticai.svg)](https://pypistats.org/packages/climaticai) climaticai is an AutoML library which builds, optimizes, and evaluates machine learning pipelines using domain-specific objective functions. **Key Functionality** * **Automation** - Makes machine learning easier. Avoid training and tuning models by hand. Includes data quality checks, cross-validation and more. * **Data Checks** - Catches and warns of problems with your data and problem setup before modeling. * **End-to-end** - Constructs and optimizes pipelines that include state-of-the-art preprocessing, feature engineering, feature selection, and a variety of modeling techniques. * **Model Understanding** - Provides tools to understand and introspect on models, to learn how they'll behave in your problem domain. * **Domain-specific** - Includes repository of domain-specific objective functions and an interface to define your own. ## Install [from PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/climaticai/) ```shell pip install climaticai ``` ### Add-ons #### Update checker Receive automatic notifications of new climaticai releases ```shell pip install climaticai[update_checker] ``` ## Start #### Load and split example data ```python import climaticai X, y = climaticai.demos.load_breast_cancer() X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = climaticai.preprocessing.split_data(X, y, problem_type='binary') ``` #### Run AutoML ```python from climaticai.automl import AutoMLSearch automl = AutoMLSearch(X_train=X_train, y_train=y_train, problem_type='binary') automl.search() ``` #### View pipeline rankings ```python automl.rankings ``` #### Get best pipeline and predict on new data ```python pipeline = automl.best_pipeline pipeline.predict(X_test) ``` ## Next Steps Read more about climaticai on our [documentation page](https://climaticai.alteryx.com/): * [Installation](https://climaticai.alteryx.com/en/stable/install.html) and [getting started](https://climaticai.alteryx.com/en/stable/start.html). * [Tutorials](https://climaticai.alteryx.com/en/stable/tutorials.html) on how to use climaticai. * [User guide](https://climaticai.alteryx.com/en/stable/user_guide.html) which describes climaticai's features. * Full [API reference](https://climaticai.alteryx.com/en/stable/api_reference.html) ## Built at Alteryx Innovation Labs
info.name: climaticai
info.summary: climaticai is a library that builds, optimizes, and evaluates machine learning pipelines
